name: ET Remove Comment Author Info
author: Milan Kaneria

sections.description:
This plugin will insert a link in the comment form that will allow the comment author to delete their personal info from it that is stored in a cookie. Only unregistered commenter will be provided with the delete link if they already had a previously posted comment.

Support

For support queries, please leave your comments on the plugin page.
sections.installation:
1. Download the zip archive and extract the folder/files.
  2. Upload the extracted folder/files to your WordPress plugins directory (/wp-content/plugins/).
  3. From Administration Panels go to Plugins and click “Activate” for “ET Remove Comment Author Info” plugin.
sections.faq:
I cannot see the delete link

Only unregistered users will be provided with the delete link if they already had a previously posted comment.

short_description: This plugin allows commenter to remove their comment author details from the comment form.
